nodes.text: Tash Scrambas was the father of Pello Scrambas.
Scrambas served as Captain aboard the frigate Qel-Droma. During the Alderaan Ascendancy Contention, he refused to take any sides and cooperated with Jorus C'baoth in negotiating a truce.
The day the crisis ended, Scrambas's 15-year-old son, Pello, joined the Alderaanian armed forces.
